comment: New Patreon Post: Goddess of the Hunt https://www.patreon.com/posts/goddess-of-hunt-34332891
This is what I get for procrastinating
2 cars pulled out in front of me
Me to body: "If you're planning on getting sick anyways, FOR THE LOVE OF GOD DO IT THIS WEEK!"
How are you holding up Noodle?
My feet hurt and I've got 3 more days before a day off
Do you have one of those pressure relief pads you can stand on... or maybe get some fancy shoe cushions?
so I got up today, off for the next 48ish hours now, pretty run of the mill stuff
surprise - family from out of towns come to visit
everyone else has expected this for a week
But it's the inherent issue of standing for 8+ hours straight
For multiple days in a row.  Something the human body really wasn't designed for.
We can argue the same about sitting in front of computer monitors 24/7, but at the very least sitting is more comfortable :P
feels kinda sucky - I have family over and Alonzo Lerone just came online after close to a month of silence to mention that his mom is fading in the hospital
ah, the update, she‚Äôs passed away
